meta.title: IVPN Pricing - VPN subscription with anonymous registration

pricing.title: Select IVPN Plan
pricing.description: Select a plan to create your account instantly. You can switch between IVPN Standard and Pro any time in the future.
pricing.productFooterPrice: All prices are in U.S. dollars.
pricing.productFooterReview: Review pricing for business or nonprofit teams
pricing.feature2: Open-source applications for Android, iOS, macOS, Windows and Linux
pricing.feature3: Cash, Monero and Bitcoin payment options for better anonymity
pricing.feature7: Killswitch/firewall and obfuscation methods where applicable
pricing.trustList1: No logs, regularly audited VPN service
pricing.trustList5: Strong ethics: no trackers, no false promises, no surveillance ads

login.title: Log In
login.enterCaptcha: Please enter the captcha you see above:

metaTitle.paymentReceived: IVPN Account - Payment has been received

account.greetingsText: Please make sure you save your Account ID in a safe place, you will use it to connect to the VPN. You don't need to enter your email to use our service.
account.continueToPayment2: To start using IVPN add funds to your account.
account.qrScan: Scan from our mobile apps for quick setup.
account.safeReferenceDescription: Safe reference ID can be used when communicating with support engineers by email.
account.changeProductDesc: You can change your product plan any time. If your account is active, changing the product type will change the amount of time left on your account.
account.thisDate: This date is calculated based on the current time left on your account, and the price difference between product types. Long-term discounts are not applicable. No additional payment is required.
account.changeProductSuccess: Product has been successfully changed to
account.newBillingCycle: New billing cycle will be applied at the end of the current billing period
account.confirmChangeProduct: IVPN Standard allows VPN access on 2 devices. Initiating a plan change will log you out from all active devices. You can log in to new devices afterwards. Please confirm to proceed.
account.disableRecurringDesc: Disabling recurring payments will remove stored payment information from our system and disable automatic renewal of the service.
account.updateEmailServiceSuccess: Email service has been successfully updated.

authentication.title: Authenticate using Account ID
authentication.desc: Disabling email & password authentication will remove your email address and password hash from our systems.
authentication.makeSure: please make sure you've written down your Account ID, since you will use it to log into client area:

authenticationEmail.title: Set up email & password authentication
authenticationEmail.pleaseEnter: Please enter your email and password you'll use to log into client area.

paymentMethod.title: Set payment method
paymentMethod.pleaseLog: Please log into your paypal account using the button below.

disable.title: Disable 2-Factor Authentication
disable.desc: To disable two-factor authentication, please enter code from TOTP app or a backup code.

enable.title: Enable 2-Factor Authentication
enable.instructions: To enable two-factor authentication, please scan the code with a TOTP app (for example: Google Authenticator) and enter the code in the field below.
enable.scan: If you cannot scan QR code, you can enter the following information manually.
enable.success: Two-factor authentication was set up successfully.
enable.successDesc: Please record the following backup codes which you will be able to use instead of TOTP in case you lost access to your device.
enable.eachCode: Each of these codes can be used only once.

wireguardTab.title: WireGuard
wireguardTab.description1: If you are using the IVPN Apps for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android or iOS, WireGuard keys are managed automatically, simply select the WireGuard protocol in the app settings.
wireguardTab.description2: If you are using the native WireGuard client then you need to manually create your keys and the necessary configuration files. We provide a configuration file generator that will generate WireGuard keys, allow you to specify the servers you require and other parameters. You simply import the configuration file and are ready to connect.
wireguardTab.manuallyConfigure: If you wish to manually configure WireGuard and just need to submit a new public key then use the form below.
wireguardTab.noWireguardKeys: There are no WireGuard keys added manually for this account.
wireguardTab.renewAccount: Please renew your account to manage WireGuard keys.
wireguardTab.configStep1Content: A private and public key pair will be generated within the browser. The private key will be included in the config file that you download. Only the public key is sent to our server. You can review the code on
wireguardTab.configStep2Title: 2. Select one or multiple exit servers
wireguardTab.configStep2Content: A separate configuration file will be generated for each location that you include.
wireguardTab.configStep3Content: You may need to configure a custom port if you are behind a restrictive firewall.
wireguardTab.vpnTunnelTrafficDesc: By default, you will receive both an IPv4 and IPv6 address. You can specify if you wish to receive only IPv4 or IPv6 address.
wireguardTab.dnsSettingsNote1: When AntiTracker is enabled, IVPN blocks ads, malicious websites, and third-party trackers using our private DNS servers.
wireguardTab.aboutHow: about how IVPN AntiTracker is implemented.
wireguardTab.dnsSettingsNote2: Hardcore mode blocks the leading companies with business models relying on user surveillance (currently: Google and Facebook).
wireguardTab.pleaseEnter: Please enter a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address.
wireguardTab.deleteKeyConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this key?

deviceManagementTab.disabledDesc1: When enabled, you can review devices logged into the service and remotely log them out as needed.
deviceManagementTab.disabledDesc2: We recommend securely storing device identifiers with encryption to identify and disconnect devices when you don't have access to them.
deviceManagementTab.disabledDesc3: Learn more about this feature and its potential privacy implications
deviceManagementTab.enabledDesc1: You are currently not logged in to the service on any device.
deviceManagementTab.enabledDesc2: to the IVPN app to add a device. Once added, your device identifiers will appear on this page.
deviceManagementTab.increaseDeviceLimit: To increase your device limit to
deviceManagementTab.disablePopupDesc1: Please note - after disabling Device management:
deviceManagementTab.disablePopupDesc2: You won’t be logged out from your devices.
deviceManagementTab.disablePopupDesc3: You won’t be able to manage your devices on your dashboard.
deviceManagementTab.confirmLogoutAll: Please confirm you want to log out from all devices.
deviceManagementTab.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this device?
deviceManagementTab.renewAccount: Please renew your account to manage your devices.

accountSettingsTab.title: Account Settings
accountSettingsTab.2faDesc: When enabled, 2-factor authentication will be required in the client area and IVPN apps.
accountSettingsTab.pleaseCheck: Please check or update your payment method and try again.
accountSettingsTab.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
accountSettingsTab.deleteAccountConfirmDesc: To confirm permanent deletion of your account, please enter the following symbols in the field below:
accountSettingsTab.warningDesc: this operation cannot be undone. Deleting your account will permanently remove data from our systems.

paymentReceived.title: Your payment has been received
paymentReceived.accountExtended: Your account has been extended to
paymentReceived.review: . You can review your payment details and details about your selected plan on the account page.
paymentReceived.join: Join our community for news, product updates, and discussion:
paymentReceived.nextSteps: Take the next step in improving your privacy:
paymentReceived.yourAccount: Your account will be credited once your Bitcoin payment is confirmed.
paymentReceived.questions: If you have any questions please

payments.byMaking: By making a payment you are agreeing to our

bitcoin.bitcoinDescription: We run our own Bitcoin and Lightning Network nodes using a self-hosted BTCPay server instance. Payments are processed by IVPN and no 3rd parties are involved.
bitcoin.bitcoinOnchain: On-chain Bitcoin payments are not available for IVPN 1 Week top-ups. We suggest using BTC Lightning or switching to a different payment method.

paypal.solveCaptcha: Please solve the following captcha to continue.
paypal.enterNumbers: Please enter the numbers you see above:
paypal.toProceed: To proceed with payment please log into your paypal account using the button below.
paypal.automaticallyRenew: Automatically renew at the end of period
paypal.enablingThisCheckbox: Enabling this checkbox will make your payment method saved and automatically billed at the end of period. You will be able to cancel automatic renewal any time.

creditCard.cardIssue: There was an issue with your card. Please try again.
creditCard.ccAutomaticRenewalInfo: Automatic renewals are always off by default. You may enable this if it is more convenient for you. Your card data will be stored by Braintree however you can cancel automatic renewal at any time from your account page.
creditCard.errorAbove: The above error message comes directly from Braintree, our credit card payment processor. You may update your card details and/or add additional information and try again.
creditCard.byDesign: By design we always request the minimum information however some card issuers require more than just the card number. e.g. Name, Email. You may optionally submit this information to increase the chances that your payment is successful. This data is sent directly from your browser to our payment processor (braintreepayments.com) and is never seen by IVPN.

cash.toTheFollowingAddress: to the address below. We recommend clicking on the button below to print the address label and reference number.
cash.ifYouDontInclude: if you do not include your unique reference number above we will not be able to attribute your payment to your account.
cash.weRecommend: We recommend wrapping cash bills in two sheets of paper for extra security.
cash.cashPaymentsNormally: Cash payments normally take 2-4 weeks to be received depending on the location the envelope was sent from and the postal service. When the envelope reaches the address in Berlin it is forwarded to a different location where our billing team collects the payment and credits it to your account. Therefore, if you are tracking the package it will take a further 1-2 weeks after the item is received before your account is credited.
cash.pleaseNoteCash: Please note that cash payments are sent at your own risk.
cash.weAccept: We accept Cash payments starting from 1 year. Please return back and select at least 1 year period.

monero.pleaseUse: Please use the following payment details to transfer Monero:
monero.information: Information about the last recent payment will be displayed here.
monero.note1: Your account will automatically be extended after the payment is confirmed. This may take a couple of minutes.
monero.note2: The address specified above is permanent for your account. You can use it to top up your account at any time in thefuture.

voucher.codeFrom: Code from a Voucher issued by IVPN:
voucher.pleaseNote: Please note: Voucher codes are stored in our system for 30 days after use to help resolve activation issues. Account recovery is not possible after this period.
voucher.successPayment: Voucher applied successfully. Service is extended until

vouchersTab.notEligibleDesc: When eligible, you can share five 30-day IVPN test voucher codes with others new to IVPN.
vouchersTab.notEligibleDesc2: IVPN vouchers are available to existing accounts that have at least 60 days of paid time remaining.
vouchersTab.notEligibleDesc3: Extend your account to meet the criteria:
vouchersTab.eligibleDesc: Below you can find five free voucher codes.
vouchersTab.eligibleDesc2: Share them with others to redeem for 30 days of time on their new IVPN accounts.
vouchersTab.eligibleDesc3: Recipients can redeem the voucher codes by:
vouchersTab.recipients1: Creating a new IVPN Standard or Pro account
vouchersTab.recipients3: Following the voucher code redemption link
vouchersTab.notes1: Vouchers are available and can be redeemed as long as you have at least 60 days of paid time remaining on your IVPN account
vouchersTab.notes2: Vouchers can be only applied once to new IVPN Standard or Pro accounts without previous voucher or payment history
vouchersTab.notes3: Free voucher offer runs until 30 September 2024
vouchersTab.notes4: For privacy reasons, we don't display redemption status of the codes above

resetPassword.resetPasswordDesc: If an account with the specified email address exists we will send an email with further instructions on how to reset your password.
resetPassword.enterEmail: Please enter your registered email address. You will be sent instructions on how to reset your password.
resetPassword.setNewPasswordDesc: Your password has been changed successfully.

openVpnConfig.step1Title: 1. Select one or multiple exit servers
openVpnConfig.step1Desc: A separate configuration file will be generated for each location that you include.
openVpnConfig.step2Desc: You may need to configure a custom port if you are behind a restrictive firewall.
openVpnConfig.dnsSettingsNote1: When AntiTracker is enabled, IVPN blocks ads, malicious websites, and third-party trackers using our private DNS servers.
openVpnConfig.aboutHow: about how IVPN AntiTracker is implemented.
openVpnConfig.dnsSettingsNote2: Hardcore mode blocks the leading companies with business models relying on user surveillance (currently: Google and Facebook).
openVpnConfig.enterValidIp: Please enter a valid IPv4 address.
